00009 #include "ndarray/python/numpy.hpp"

00011 namespace ndarray {
00012 
00013 template <typename TUnaryFunctor, 
00014           typename TArgument=typename TUnaryFunctor::argument_type,
00015           typename TResult=typename TUnaryFunctor::result_type>
00016 struct PyUnaryUFunctor {
00017 
00018     static PyObject* _call_(TUnaryFunctor const& self, PyObject* input, PyObject* output) {
00019         PyObject* input_array = PyArray_FROM_OTF(input,detail::NumpyTraits<TArgument>::getCode(),
00020                                                  NPY_ALIGNED);
00021         if (input_array == NULL) return NULL;
00022         PyObject* output_array;
00023         if (output == NULL || output == Py_None) {
00024             output_array = PyArray_SimpleNew(PyArray_NDIM(input_array),
00025                                              PyArray_DIMS(input_array),
00026                                              detail::NumpyTraits<TResult>::getCode());
00027         } else {
00028             output_array = PyArray_FROM_OTF(output,detail::NumpyTraits<TResult>::getCode(),
00029                                             NPY_ALIGNED | NPY_WRITEABLE | NPY_UPDATEIFCOPY);
00030         }
00031         if (output_array == NULL) {
00032             Py_DECREF(input_array);
00033             return NULL;
00034         }
00035         PyObject* iter = PyArray_MultiIterNew(2,input_array,output_array);
00036         if (iter == NULL) {
00037             Py_DECREF(input_array);
00038             Py_DECREF(output_array);
00039             return NULL;
00040         }
00041         int size = ((PyArrayMultiIterObject*)(iter))->size;
00042         while (size--) {
00043             TArgument* arg = (TArgument*)PyArray_MultiIter_DATA(iter,0);
00044             TResult* res = (TResult*)PyArray_MultiIter_DATA(iter,1);
00045             *res = self(*arg);
00046             PyArray_MultiIter_NEXT(iter);
00047         }
00048         Py_DECREF(input_array);
00049         Py_DECREF(iter);
00050         return PyArray_Return(reinterpret_cast<PyArrayObject*>(output_array));
00051     }
00052     
00053 };

00056 template <typename TBinaryFunctor, 
00057           typename TArgument1=typename TBinaryFunctor::first_argument_type,
00058           typename TArgument2=typename TBinaryFunctor::second_argument_type,
00059           typename TResult=typename TBinaryFunctor::result_type>
00060 struct PyBinaryUFunctor {
00061 
00062     static PyObject* _call_(TBinaryFunctor const& self, PyObject* input1, PyObject* input2, 
00063                               PyObject* output) {
00064         PyObject* input1_array = PyArray_FROM_OTF(input1,detail::NumpyTraits<TArgument1>::getCode(),
00065                                                   NPY_ALIGNED);
00066         PyObject* input2_array = PyArray_FROM_OTF(input2,detail::NumpyTraits<TArgument1>::getCode(),
00067                                                   NPY_ALIGNED);
00068         if (input1_array == NULL || input2_array == NULL) {
00069             Py_XDECREF(input1_array);
00070             Py_XDECREF(input2_array);
00071             return NULL;
00072         }
00073         PyObject* output_array;
00074         if (output == NULL || output == Py_None) {
00075             PyObject* tmp = PyArray_MultiIterNew(2,input1_array,input2_array);
00076             if (tmp == NULL) {
00077                 Py_XDECREF(input1_array);
00078                 Py_XDECREF(input2_array);
00079                 return NULL;
00080             }
00081             PyArrayMultiIterObject* tmp_iter = (PyArrayMultiIterObject*)tmp;
00082             output_array = PyArray_SimpleNew(tmp_iter->nd,tmp_iter->dimensions,
00083                                              detail::NumpyTraits<TResult>::getCode());
00084             Py_DECREF(tmp);
00085         } else {
00086             output_array = PyArray_FROM_OTF(output,detail::NumpyTraits<TResult>::getCode(),
00087                                             NPY_ALIGNED | NPY_WRITEABLE | NPY_UPDATEIFCOPY);
00088         }
00089         if (output_array == NULL) {
00090             Py_DECREF(input1_array);
00091             Py_DECREF(input2_array);
00092             return NULL;
00093         }
00094         PyObject* iter = PyArray_MultiIterNew(3,input1_array,input2_array,output_array);
00095         if (iter == NULL) {
00096             Py_DECREF(input1_array);
00097             Py_DECREF(input2_array);
00098             Py_DECREF(output_array);
00099             return NULL;
00100         }
00101         int size = ((PyArrayMultiIterObject*)(iter))->size;
00102         while (size--) {
00103             TArgument1* arg1 = (TArgument1*)PyArray_MultiIter_DATA(iter,0);
00104             TArgument2* arg2 = (TArgument2*)PyArray_MultiIter_DATA(iter,1);
00105             TResult* res = (TResult*)PyArray_MultiIter_DATA(iter,2);
00106             *res = self(*arg1,*arg2);
00107             PyArray_MultiIter_NEXT(iter);
00108         }
00109         Py_DECREF(input1_array);
00110         Py_DECREF(input2_array);
00111         Py_DECREF(iter);
00112         return PyArray_Return(reinterpret_cast<PyArrayObject*>(output_array));
00113     }
00114     
00115 };
